Name: Fortress
Description: +1 CON and WIS per Rune Level

Name: Blessed
Description: At the start of your turn, recover 3 HP per Rune Level

Name: Healing
Description: The weapon can be used as a staff, and can heal an Ally by Might + INT HP

Name: Throwing
Description: Your weapon gains +1 Max Range, at the cost of 2 Might and 10 Accuracy
